New Records: Colin Ackermann got his first fifty at a T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Shakib Al Hasan ran out Max O'Dowd
Taskin Ahmed sent back two Dutch batters off the first two balls of the chase
Nurul Hasan broke the stumps to run out Tom Cooper
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played on October 24, 2022, at Hobart
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh's victory was a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Players expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The groundstaff worked during a rain break
Paul van Meekeren was pumped after breaking the opening stand
Tim Pringle struck the first ball
Others: The match was the 17th in Group 2 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
